name: You only do one thing
description:
You wake up and there's a BUTTON in front of YOU ████████████████████████████████████ What do I do? Press it. I don't want to make a wish. Just use your Mouse1 and Press it. ████████████████████████████████████ Additional Credits

The game was made possible with additional resources that was not made by me:

Music by t4ngr4m (from OpenGameArt.org)

Additional Sounds from Kenney.nl

Additional Sounds from zapsplat.com

Remaining programming, game, art and sounds was made by me (albeit using several programs).
